parameters.name: BackupLogIntervalSeconds
parameters.description:
The interval at which you want to perform incremental log backups. Unit: seconds.

> This parameter takes effect only when physical backups are performed.

parameters.name: BackupPeriod
parameters.description:
The day of each week when the full backup task runs. Valid values:

- Monday

- Tuesday

- Wednesday

- Thursday

- Friday

- Saturday

- Sunday

parameters.name: BackupPlanId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup schedule.

parameters.name: BackupStartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the full backup task. Specify the time in the HH:mm format.

parameters.name: BackupStrategyType
parameters.description:
The backup method that you want to use for full backups. Valid values:

- **simple**: scheduled backup. If you specify this value for the BackupStrategyType parameter, you must also specify the BackupPeriod and BackupStartTime parameters.

- **Manual**: manual backup.

> Default value: **simple**.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.
